resume.title: #STOPCOVID19
resume.paragraph:
Fighting the pandemic whith solidarity.

The Common Good Chain makes its donation traceability platform available to society free of charge to help in the fight against COVID-19. Donors will be able to see in real time how funds are managed and emergency experts will validate funded projects. In this way, the risk of fraud is greatly minimized and money is guaranteed to reach those who need it most.

how-work.title: How does it work?
how-work.paragraph: Thanks to blockchain technology, the different organizations that are fighting the coronavirus will be able to upload their projects to ComGo and receive financing, in a 100% transparent and fully traceable way. ComGo currently allows the identification of other participating entities, improving the coordination of projects. Donors will be able to see what is happening within the same project at all times, regardless of whether it is managed by one or more entities. In addition, since each project must be accompanied by a calendar of milestones and activities, the status of the project will be visible in real time.

how-support.title: Who supports us?
how-support.paragraph: We are not alone, in the fight against COVID-19, . Thanks to the support of these entities, we can make our platform have the greatest possible impact and completely free of charge:

how-help.title: How I can help?
how-help.paragraph: If you are an institutional donor, a CSR, a foundation, family office, or a public administration that want to manage your donations to projects, call for aid and manage your projects efficiently and transparently, don't hesitate on contact us. We would like to work with you

why.title: Towards transparent impact reporting
why.paragraph: We dream of an ecosystem where NGOs and social entities are able to show the heart of their work to achieve citizen's empathy and accomplish their mission. By communicating the social impact they create they can increase trust and collaboration. We at ComGo share their mission and want to take part to create a better world.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.paragraph: ComGo helps donors and collaborators participate of the day to day development of the projects they support.

responsibility.title: Responsibility
responsibility.paragraph: Our platform encourages responsible donations offering the necessary information and traceability for each project.

efficiency.title: Efficiency
efficiency.paragraph: At ComGo we dream of a social sector that optimizes 100% of the resources to accomplish the mission of a better world.

projects.title: ComGo network
projects.subtitle: The first digital platform for impact reporting co-created along with all the agents taking part in the impact sector.
projects.paragraph: Bring your impact community closer, allow new relationships, give voice to your beneficiaries and collect data to better drive your decisions to increase your impact.
projects.your-project-subtitle: Host your social projects in ComGo
projects.your-project-content: If you are a social organization, host your projects in our platform to offer your donors a way to follow their contributions. Transparency, efficiency and responsibility

ITWILLBE.title: Street Children Protection in India
ITWILLBE.content: Hardware acquisition to scale PPa-People's Protection App technological solution to register and protect Street Children in India from mafias and exploitation

CARITAS.title: Improving commercialization and production methods
CARITAS.content: Improving the quality of life of families by helping them improve the production capacity, commercialization of their products, and financial support in food security and climate change management.

KUBUKA.title: Project Humanitas Educational Center
KUBUKA.content: The project aims to promote quality education in Humanitas Educational Center in Silanga, Kibera. To reach this objective the team works in 4 main areas: 1. Reduce the absenteeism of the kids. 2. Create an appropriate educational space. 3. Empower the teachers through training. 4. Involve the parents.

FARMA.title: Pharmaceutical School in Uganda
FARMA.content: Program to educate skilled pharmaceutical staff to provide medicine guidance, first aid, water and food analysis and more in Uganda

what.title: A digital ecosystem for the common good
what.subtitle: ComGo unleashes impact management and automated impact reporting solutions for organizations that work for the common good.

management.title: Social project management
management.paragraph: ComGo helps organizations manage their projects and report impact in the most transparent and efficient possible way.

measurement.title: Measurement of impact
measurement.paragraph: So that accurate data and real impact drive funding decisions.

auditing.title: Transparent auditing
auditing.paragraph: Enabling social organizations to reduce their auditing costs to focus on what they are best at: creating social impact.

action.title: A network for everyone
action.paragraph: We want to use blockchain to change the way donations are made and traced.

donations.title: Donors
donations.subtitle: Open for everyone
donations.paragraph: Learn the real impact of your donations and follow the development of the projects you support.

corporate.title: Corporate donors
corporate.subtitle: Established companies
corporate.paragraph: Help your company become transparent. ComGo offers a new way of understanding CSR.

ngos.title: Social Organization
ngos.subtitle: Established NGOs
ngos.paragraph: Manage your imapact efficiently and report in real time to all your stakeholders.

stop-covid-description.title: Your donations can save lives.
stop-covid-description.subtitle: Your ideas, too.
stop-covid-description.paragraph: The Common Good Chain offers its platform to society for free, to trace donation on the blockchain so that life-saving ideas can be financed in an efficient and transparent way during the COVID-19 crisis. Donors can see in real time how funds are being managed, and emergency experts will validate the financed projects.
